value.title: How to use Search APIs in Azure Maps | Azure Friday

value.title: How to use Serial Console to set up kdump | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, Chen from the Azure Serial Console team will show you how to configure your kdump on your virtual machine.
